testcase.name: [sut] Prepare SUT: Reset Redis-DB used by rspamd _raw_params=redis-cli -s /var/run/redis/rspamd.sock flushall
[client] client: Send a mail from client to an address SUT is responsible for _raw_params=echo "Test-Body" | mailx -s "Test" does-not-exist@mydomain.test
testcase.system-out: { "ansible_facts": { "discovered_interpreter_python": "/usr/bin/python" }, "changed": true, "cmd": "echo \"Test-Body\" | mailx -s \"Test\" does-not-exist@mydomain.test\n", "delta": "0:00:00.034889", "end": "2020-04-19 23:42:32.763597", "rc": 0, "start": "2020-04-19 23:42:32.728708", "stderr": "", "stderr_lines": [], "stdout": "", "stdout_lines": [], "warnings": [ "Platform linux on host client is using the discovered Python interpreter at /usr/bin/python, but future installation of another Python interpreter could change this. testcase.name:
[sut] sut: Assert mail is received by SUT and delivered to the catch-all account file={{ find_result.files[0].path }}, with_content=Return-Path: <vagrant@localhost> Delivered-To: john.doe@mydomain.test ... To: does-not-exist@mydomain.test Subject: Test ... From: vagrant@localhost ...
Test-Body
